structure.unit: Chapter 14B FOOD AND FOOD SERVICE ESTABLISHMENTS
ARTICLE II. MINIMUM STANDARDS OF HYGIENE FOR PUBLIC FOOD SERVICE ESTABLISHMENTS

text.section:
Sec. 14B-13.1. Fees.
The following fees shall be charged and collected by the Dade County Department of Public Health for inspection, permitting and certification as provided for in this article:
Food service establishments (restaurants):
0—30 seats
—60 seats
Over 60 seats
Groceries and meat markets25.00
Mobile food services units25.00
Temporary food service25.00
Take out food service (no seats)25.00
Food processing plants25.00
Public schools and public institutionsNo fees
Certification of food for expert50.00
